config.ichunutil.cat.general.name: General
config.ichunutil.cat.general.desc: These configs are general configs that don't fit any other category.
config.ichunutil.cat.gameplay.name: Gameplay
config.ichunutil.cat.gameplay.desc: These configs affect the gameplay while using the mod.
config.ichunutil.cat.global.name: Global
config.ichunutil.cat.global.desc: These configs affect both servers and clients that load the mod.
config.ichunutil.cat.serverOnly.name: Server Only
config.ichunutil.cat.serverOnly.desc: These configs affect only the server that loads the mod.
config.ichunutil.cat.clientOnly.name: Client Only
config.ichunutil.cat.clientOnly.desc: These configs affect only the client that loads the mod.
config.ichunutil.cat.block.name: Blocks
config.ichunutil.cat.block.desc: These configs affect the blocks in the mod.
config.ichunutil.cat.bns.name: Boxes & Stuff (B&S)
config.ichunutil.cat.bns.desc: These configs affect GUIs using B&S.
Renders B&S's GUIs in a Minecraft Style instead.
0 = Default Style
1 = Vanilla Style
2 = Texture Pack Style.
config.ichunutil.prop.bnsDockPadding.des: How much padding to add to the docked windows.
config.ichunutil.prop.bnsDockBorder.name: Dock Border Size
config.ichunutil.prop.bnsDockBorder.desc: Number of pixels before iChunUtil thinks you're trying to dock a window.
config.ichunutil.prop.bnsDoubleClickSpee: Speed (in ticks) to register a double click.
config.ichunutil.prop.bnsTooltipCooldown: How long to mouse over an element (in ticks) before showing a tooltip.
config.ichunutil.prop.bnsTheme.name: Theme
config.ichunutil.prop.bnsTheme.desc: Theme to use for Boxes & Stuff
gui.ichunutil.configs.title: Config Editor
gui.ichunutil.configs.needsRestart: Some configs changed require a restart to take effect!
gui.ichunutil.configs.noEditingServerCon: You can only edit a SERVER config in a single player world environment!
window.popup.title: Alert!
window.saveAs.title: Save As
